name: Alera_Narrow_Profile_Bookcase_
reviews: I am very pleased with this item. I only had a 13" space beside my desk and was happy to find this cabinet that fit in there perfectly. I was especially impressed with the quality.....a nice sturdy backing vice cardboard. It was easy to put together and is very functional for office files and supplies.
I purchased two of these for my master bedroom. I love my books and did not know how to fit a bookcase into such a tight space. These meet the need in style.

We were looking for a long thin bookcase for our small family room. This works perfect. It is well made and it was the color we wanted. It was easy to put together and it didn't take my husband long at all. I would recommend this bookcase.

This bookcase is just as advertised. The material is well-finished, all the parts fit together as they should and the finished product is good looking. The size of this "narrow" bookcase was perfect for its intended space. There was a problem with one of the drilled holes required for assembly - I called and reported the problem and a replacement part was sent out immediately. Good product and service.
Rich looking and does the job in small places this bookcase solved a lot of problems in my small home
Very nice looking and very practical for narrow spaces.
description:
"Space-saving stylish storage. Full-finished back provides a
professional appearance. Generous 11-3/4"" deep shelves accommodate
three-ring binders and large publications. Quick-lock fasteners
allow easy assembly. Color: MahoganyMaterials: Wood VeneerFinish: N/ADimensions: 11 3/4""L x 12""W x 72""HNumber of shelves: 6Number of drawers/compartments: N/AModel: ALEBCS67212MYMaterialMahogany, WoodColorBrownFurniture Frame MaterialWood
